title: Ollie Nott
text:
Ollie Nott (born 26 May 1995) is a Canadian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for the <a href="Toronto%20Arrows">Toronto Arrows</a> of <a href="Major%20League%20Rugby">Major League Rugby</a> (MLR) and the <a href="Canada%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Canadian national team</a>. His preferred position is <a href="Flanker%20%28rugby%20union%29">flanker</a>.
Professional career.
Nott signed for <a href="Major%20League%20Rugby">Major League Rugby</a> side <a href="Toronto%20Arrows">Toronto Arrows</a> in June 2021 during the <a href="2021%20Major%20League%20Rugby%20season">2021 Major League Rugby season</a>. Nott made his debut for <a href="Canada%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Canada</a> in the <a href="2017%20Americas%20Rugby%20Championship">2017 Americas Rugby Championship</a>.
